title: Too Yorick or not too Yorick?
body: I made a different post about which champ to buy, may have seen it idk. I got soe good answers but Yorick is just 2spooky5me and i feel like i should spend my hard  earned ip on him and main him, thoughts? (Yes i know hes really bad atm but idc)

replies.body: bet u never knew reporting yourslef was possible
oh and the yorick sucked so bad he reported himself

> oh and the yorick sucked so bad he reported himself

CANT WAIT TILL THEY RELEASE THE YORICK UPDA..... *Rito tells me too shhh*
Oh ok the Awwwesommmme new champ called ekko
sorry did i say 10, I meant 3000
A good yorick is a legend. A bad yorick is gg surrender at 20, 10 reports.
